Package DB

Class DatabaseController

java.lang.Object
DB.DatabaseController
public class DatabaseController extends Object
Manages database operations for the user management system. This controller handles the interaction between the user management system and the database, including inserting new employees into the database.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs a DatabaseController object.

  • Constructor Details

    • DatabaseController

      public DatabaseController(Connection connectionToDB, DB.UserManagementSystemDB userManagementSystemDB)
      Constructs a DatabaseController object. It initializes the database connection using provided user credentials and inserts existing employees from the user management system into the database.
      Parameters:
      connectionToDB - The connection to the database.
      userManagementSystemDB - An instance of UserManagementSystemDB that provides access to employee data.

  • Method Details

    • insertEmployees

      public int insertEmployees(ArrayList<common.worker.GeneralParkWorker> employees)
      Inserts a list of employees into the database. This method takes the list of employees retrieved from the user management system and persists them into the database. Implementation note: This method's body should contain the logic to convert the list of employees into appropriate SQL INSERT statements and execute them using the established database connection. Error handling and transaction management should also be considered.
      Parameters:
      employees - general park worker employees Arraylist to insert to db
      Returns:
      int amount of insertion succeeded

    • insertUsageReport

      public boolean insertUsageReport(common.worker.UsageReport report)
      Inserts a new usage report into the database. This method first inserts data into the 'report' table and then into the 'UsageReport' table. It converts the daily usage map to a JSON string for storage in the 'UsageReport' table.
      Parameters:
      report - The UsageReport object containing the report data to be inserted.
      Returns:
      true if the insertion was successful, false otherwise.

    • findPlaceInWaiting

      public ArrayList<common.WaitingList> findPlaceInWaiting(common.Order order)
      This function return orders in waiting list that can replace the can canceled order.
      Parameters:
      order - ArrayList containing: parkId,maxVisitors in the park, estimatedStayTime in the park, date of the canceled order, timeToCheck of the canceled order,
      Returns:
      ArrayList object containing matching order.

    • getPendingNotificationsOrdersByID

      public ArrayList<common.Order> getPendingNotificationsOrdersByID(Integer travelerIdToCheckPendingNotifications)
      Retrieves a list of pending notification orders for a given traveler ID. This method fetches orders from the database that belong to the specified traveler and have a status of "PENDING_EMAIL_SENT". It returns an ArrayList containing the retrieved orders.
      Parameters:
      travelerIdToCheckPendingNotifications - The ID of the traveler for whom pending notification orders are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of Order objects representing the pending notification orders for the specified traveler.

      Parameters:
      travelerIdToCheckCanceledNotifications - The ID of the traveler for whom canceled notifications are to be checked.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of Order objects representing the canceled orders for the specified traveler ID.

    • updateOrderStatusForToday

      public Boolean updateOrderStatusForToday()
      Updates the order status for today in the database.
      Returns:
      True if the order status update was successful; false otherwise.

    • updateWaitingListStatusForToday

      public Boolean updateWaitingListStatusForToday()
      Updates the waiting list status for today in the database.
      Returns:
      True if the waiting list status update was successful; false otherwise.

    • ChangeTravelerToGuide

      public boolean ChangeTravelerToGuide(common.Traveler traveler)
      Updates a traveler's record to mark them as a guide.
      Parameters:
      traveler - object to update
      Returns:
      Boolean true if the update is successful, false otherwise.

    • insertNewGroupGuide

      public boolean insertNewGroupGuide(common.Traveler traveler)
      Inserts a new group guide into the traveler table of the database.
      Parameters:
      traveler - The Traveler object representing the new group guide to be inserted into the database.
      Returns:
      True if the insertion was successful and the traveler is now considered a group guide; false otherwise.

    • findOrdersWithinDates

      public Boolean findOrdersWithinDates(common.Order order, Boolean flag)
      Finding order within given times
      Parameters:
      order - the order to find dates for it
      flag - a flag to the determine if dates are available
      Returns:
      Boolean if orders within dates were found

    • getAvailableDatesList

      public ArrayList<String> getAvailableDatesList(common.Order order)
      Retrieves a list of available dates and visit times for scheduling an order.
      Parameters:
      order - The Order object representing the order for which available dates and visit times are to be determined.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList containing strings representing available dates and visit times in the format "YYYY-MM-DD, HH:MM".

    • deleteExpiredOrderAlerts

      public void deleteExpiredOrderAlerts()
      Deletes expired order alerts from the ordernotifications table.

    • updateOrderStatusArray

      public Boolean updateOrderStatusArray(ArrayList<?> info)
      Updates the order status for a single order identified by its order ID.
      Parameters:
      info - An ArrayList containing information about the new order status and the order ID. The first element of the ArrayList is the status, and the second element is the orderId
      Returns:
      true if the order status was successfully updated, false otherwise.
